title: Australia big beef country
brief_description: This film is concerned with local beef production in Australia’s tropics with the emphasis being placed on the use of improved pastures and new breeding stock to improve quality. Hygienic conditions for the production of boneless beef is ensured through government inspection. No other credits available.
